has access rights but no modify right
Sea'R'ch debtor
... used to check if open invoices exists --> "Include history handling"
... used to exclude already selected invoices
I: Initialize
If default all also precheck = true
If called from ODC fetch debtor data
O: Online
C: Cancel, leave OSP005
Search debtor
S: Ok Process selected invoice(s)
Old debtor only if not called from ODC005
If no invoices selected SP0038, and return online

ExpSyntax.val: '(INVO_AACTUALI - (select coalesce(cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV) as decimal (13,2)), 0) from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/BPIV where BPIV_INVO_NO = INVO_NO and BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE is null)) <> 0'
'exists (select * from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/BPIV where BPIV_INVO_NO = INVO_NO and BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE is null)'

Text.val: When called with parameter (from ODC005, preselected DEBC) access to
Client and old debtor lines is blocked (parameter should be valid)
Client selection
End Client selection
Debtor check/selection process can only pass using a correct client
Old debtor Selection
MSG to remind user to enter at least DEBH or BEBC_DEBC (SP0022)
Msg if check/select fails (SP0021)
DEBC match on all numbers, update if needed in Count/select
Link DEBH on DEBC_DEBH, so name/city can only be found for valid DEBC
End Old debtor selection
New debtor selection
MSG to remind user to enter at least DEBH or BEBC_DEBC
Msg if check/select fails
DEBC match on all numbers, update if needed in Count/select
Link DEBH on DEBC_DEBH, so name/city can only be found for valid DEBC
End New Debtor selection

and added to CND '...AND NOT(rtc.CodeDictionary)'
enabled only when Client, Old DEBC and New DEBC are found and differ
using recompute cycle to keep "What ToMove" synchronized with choice control
Inits are too late to handle preselection
Check if anything has been selected
Force rebuild of selection if needed
Changed to valid debtor rebuild selection
Changed to valid debtor rebuild selection

Comment.val: User event is required to be able to force a control exit, otherwise a handler on the enter key would be sufficient.

Text.val: Enter outside of the edit field means start booking
27.08.2003 JJ workaround SCR4186 Next field instead of force control exit
Force rebuild of selection if needed set to precheck
If changed from prechecked to not precheck unselect all

ItemsList.valUnicode: 1 Move all outstanding invoices to new debtor, 2 Move selection of outstanding invoices to new debtor

ExpSyntax.val: {0,60} AND NOT (LastPark (0)='v.ADMN_NO' OR LastPark (0)='v.CLNT_NO' OR LastPark (0)='v.Old.DEBH' OR LastPark (0)='v.Old.DEBC_DEBC' OR LastPark (0)='v.New.DEBH' OR LastPark (0)='v.New.DEBC_DEBC')
LastPark (0)='v.ADMN_NO' OR LastPark (0)='v.CLNT_NO' OR LastPark (0)='v.Old.DEBH' OR LastPark (0)='v.Old.DEBC_DEBC' OR LastPark (0)='v.New.DEBH' OR LastPark (0)='v.New.DEBC_DEBC'
